game.name: Hidengen
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, LAN PvP, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Hidengen is an atmospheric PvP shooter featuring stealth and vertical combat. Only one will survive. Victory requires not just strength, but cunning. Use your jetpack, shadows, height, and weather conditions to your advantage.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Hidengen is an atmospheric PvP shooter featuring stealth and vertical combat. Only one will survive. Victory requires not just strength, but cunning. Use your jetpack, shadows, height, and weather conditions to your advantage.
